title: How to Provide Maintenance to Power Windows

steps.title: Make sure to roll your window all the way down to be able to expose the window run.
steps.content: Make sure to roll your window all the way down to be able to expose the window run. The window run is the gap where the window slides through. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Once the window is down and you have access to the window run.
steps.content: Once the window is down and you have access to the window run. Grab your can of clear silicone spray, available at auto parts or home depot, and spray it into the window run generously. Make sure you spray it all around the run, since you want to lubricate it completely. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Let it stand for about 30 to 60 seconds.
steps.content: Let it stand for about 30 to 60 seconds.

steps.title: Start rolling the window up and down two to three times to allow the window to run smoothly on the run, causing the lower run to be lubricated also.
steps.content: Start rolling the window up and down two to three times to allow the window to run smoothly on the run, causing the lower run to be lubricated also. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Repeat ever month for best result.
steps.content: Repeat ever month for best result.
